content.html: I hate it when Americans include the year and model of a car in a story and you have to guess from context if it's a really good car or a really bad car. "My husband showed up to our first date in a 1983 Chevrolet Anaconda." "Haha, what a total loser or millionaire."
content.value:
I hate it when Americans include the year and model of a car in a story and you have to guess from context if it's a really good car or a really bad car. 

"My husband showed up to our first date in a 1983 Chevrolet Anaconda."

"Haha, what a total loser or millionaire."
